items.sentence: I'm sorry that I wasn't able to attend the meeting yesterday.
We need to set aside some money in case we have an emergency.
Of all the countries you've visited, which was your favorite?
I'll have a talk with Tom and ask him not to do that anymore.
Tom poured the orange juice from the bottle into the pitcher.
I don't live in Australia anymore. I've moved to New Zealand.
If you behave like a flunky, you'll be treated like a flunky.
I'm looking forward to your visit during the summer vacation.
Tom took out his knife and started whittling a piece of wood.
You're wrong if you think that Tom would do anything for you.
